Operation 'Get_User store recommendations' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary and description are identical and overly vague. They lack clarity about what 'store recommendations' means in the iPlayer context, don't explain authentication requirements, don't describe the response structure, and provide no context for AI agents to determine when to use this operation. Enhanced version clarifies the personalization aspect, authentication requirements, and expected output format.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve personalized store recommendations for user
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves personalized store recommendations for the authenticated user. This operation returns a list of recommended items or content available in the store based on the user's viewing history, preferences, and purchase behavior. Requires authentication via API key or basic auth. Returns a collection of recommendation objects with details about each recommended item.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are identical and overly vague. They lack clarity about what 'store recommendations' means in the iPlayer context, don't explain authentication requirements, don't describe the response structure, and provide no context for AI agents to determine when to use this operation. Enhanced version clarifies the personalization aspect, authentication requirements, and expected output format.

message: Operation 'Get_Programme highlights' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary and description are identical and lack specificity. They don't explain what 'highlights' means (curated/featured content), don't mention the home page context, don't describe the 4 available parameters or their purpose, and don't clarify the response structure. Enhanced version provides context about the operation's purpose, mentions parameter support for filtering/pagination, and describes the expected response format using domain terminology (programme, master brand) consistent with the API schema.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve featured programme highlights for home page
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves featured programme highlights for display on the iPlayer home page. Returns a curated collection of programmes selected for prominence, which may include trending content, new releases, or editorial picks. Supports filtering and pagination through query parameters. Returns an array of programme objects containing metadata such as title, description, broadcast information, and master brand details.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are identical and lack specificity. They don't explain what 'highlights' means (curated/featured content), don't mention the home page context, don't describe the 4 available parameters or their purpose, and don't clarify the response structure. Enhanced version provides context about the operation's purpose, mentions parameter support for filtering/pagination, and describes the expected response format using domain terminology (programme, master brand) consistent with the API schema.

message: Operation 'Get_Programme_recommendations' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary and description are identical and extremely vague. They lack context about what triggers recommendations (episode pid), what the recommendations are based on, and what is returned. Added clarity about the input parameter (episode pid), the purpose of recommendations, and the expected output to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve programme recommendations for an episode
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of recommended programmes based on a specified episode (identified by pid). Returns related or similar programmes that viewers of the given episode might find interesting. Useful for building recommendation features or discovering related content.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are identical and extremely vague. They lack context about what triggers recommendations (episode pid), what the recommendations are based on, and what is returned. Added clarity about the input parameter (episode pid), the purpose of recommendations, and the expected output to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'Get_Programmes_popular' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_context, missing_output_details, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary and description are grammatically awkward and provide no meaningful information. They don't clarify what 'popular' means (trending, most-viewed, etc.), what is returned, or the operation's purpose. Added clarity about the data source (/groups/popular), the type of content returned, and use cases for AI agent understanding.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of currently popular programmes or episodes from the /groups/popular collection. Returns trending or highly-viewed content across TV & iPlayer. Useful for discovering what's currently popular with viewers or building featured content sections.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are grammatically awkward and provide no meaningful information. They don't clarify what 'popular' means (trending, most-viewed, etc.), what is returned, or the operation's purpose. Added clarity about the data source (/groups/popular), the type of content returned, and use cases for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'Get_Episodes_by_group' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Summary is adequate and action-oriented, but description is too brief and lacks context. The description doesn't explain what the pid parameter represents, what is returned, or how groups/brands/series differ. Added clarity about the input parameter flexibility, the hierarchical nature of the content, and the expected output for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Get episodes by group, brand or series
data.current_description: Get episodes by group, brand or series
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all episodes associated with a specified group, brand, or series (identified by pid). Returns a list of episodes that belong to the given container, allowing navigation of content hierarchies. The pid parameter can reference different content grouping levels within the iPlayer hierarchy.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate and action-oriented, but description is too brief and lacks context. The description doesn't explain what the pid parameter represents, what is returned, or how groups/brands/series differ. Added clarity about the input parameter flexibility, the hierarchical nature of the content, and the expected output for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'Get_Programmes by parent PID_' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Original summary uses 'pid' without context. Description lacks clarity about what is returned and the domain terminology 'TLEO' (Top Level Editorial Object). Enhanced version clarifies the return value and uses consistent API terminology.

data.current_description: Get the programme for a given programme identifier.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the programme (TLEO) object for a given programme identifier (PID). Returns the complete programme metadata including title, description, master brand, and associated metadata. Supports multiple response formats via parameters.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses 'pid' without context. Description lacks clarity about what is returned and the domain terminology 'TLEO' (Top Level Editorial Object). Enhanced version clarifies the return value and uses consistent API terminology.

message: Operation 'Get_Episodes by parent PID_' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary uses 'child episodes' which is unclear without domain context. Description lacks information about return format (collection), pagination support, and filtering capabilities. Enhanced version clarifies these aspects for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Child episodes for a given programme pid.
data.current_description: Get the child episodes belonging to a given programme identifier.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all child episodes belonging to a given programme (TLEO) identifier. Returns a collection of episode objects with metadata. Supports pagination and filtering via parameters to control result set size and content.
data.reasoning: Summary uses 'child episodes' which is unclear without domain context. Description lacks information about return format (collection), pagination support, and filtering capabilities. Enhanced version clarifies these aspects for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'Get_Programme by PID_' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, inconsistent_terminology. Summary is too generic ('Episode for a given pid').
